screen_desc: The screenshot displays a search query on Google for "hotels in Boston, Massachusetts" with various options and buttons for booking or viewing hotel listings.
action_think: The user wants to search for flights. The Google app has a search bar where the user can type their query.
action_plan: type the flight search query into the search bar
click on the search icon or press enter
action_result: By clicking on the search bar, you have revealed the text input area. This allows you to type in your desired search query, which is necessary for searching for flights from NYC to San Diego.
prev_action_result: The user has navigated to the Google search page by clicking on the Google app. This action is a necessary step to access the search functionality and enter the user's request for searching flights from NYC to San Diego.
